title: Bug 49235: ServletContainerInitializer onStartup() method does not return expected output
description: Bug 49235: ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? extends ServletContainerInitializer> initializerClasses, ServletContext ctx) method does not return expected output. The current output is "MySomeClass", but I expect the output to be "MySomeClass". This issue is not yet implemented in the Servlet 3.0 specification. In my code, it works fine on Glassfish 3.0.
EB: I expect the output to be "MySomeClass".
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Use ServletContainerInitializer onStartup() method with the parameter set as "MySomeClass".
2. Check the output and compare it with the expected output.
